Clouds on Mansfield

Guiding Polish relatives up a mountain to a windy summit

  • Written: Oct 14, 2025
  • Date hiked: Jul 1, 2016
  • Peak: Mt. Mansfield (4,393 feet)
  • Distance: 5.2 miles
  • Town: Underhill
  • State: Vermont

Before living in the town that this part of Mansfield resides in, we were in Burlington proper.

My wife had a cousin in town from her mother-land of Poland who was here for the 4th of July. He happened to relish grueling hikes. So we set out for the highest one around.

  • Trip Report
  • Mt. Mansfield
  • Vermont
  • Underhill
